import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import Header from "../../shared/header/Header"; import Submenu from '../../layouts/submenu-layout/SubmenuLayout'; import './Grammar.scss'; const Grammar = (props) => { return (

{props.name}

{props.days}

{props.lesson}

{props.module}

Grammar Modul # Lesson #

Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. ) }; export default Grammar;
